member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect
member.summary: Lighting effect creates an image that appears to be an illuminated non-reflective surface. This effect uses the alpha channel as a height map, and lights it with an infinitely distant light source (such as the sun).

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Distant-diffuse lighting effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DistantDiffuseEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the DistantDiffuseEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for DistantDiffuse effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.LightColor
member.summary: Color of the incoming light. Default value white.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.HeightMapScale
member.summary: Height map scale factor in the Z direction. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.HeightMapKernelSize
member.summary: Size of the Sobel filter kernel used to convert the input heightmap to surface normal vectors. Default value (1,1).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.HeightMapInterpolationMode
member.summary: Interpolation mode used to filter the height map. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.Elevation
member.summary: Elevation of the light source, measured in radians in the YZ plane, counter-clockwise relative to the Y axis. Default value 0, range 0 to 2*pi.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.DiffuseAmount
member.summary: Intensity of the diffuse light. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.Azimuth
member.summary: Direction of the light source, measured in radians in the XY plane, counter-clockwise relative to the X axis. Default value 0, range 0 to 2*pi.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.EffectId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the effect.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1DistantDiffuse GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.

member.summary: Gets a collection of inputs attached to the effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.DistantDiffuseEffect.Properties
member.summary: Gets the collection of properties specific to the current effect.
